meanings.definition: The quality of being repulsive or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The repulsiveness of the garbage made me cover my nose.
meanings.sent2: Her repulsiveness towards spiders was evident when she screamed at the sight of one.
meanings.sent3: The repulsiveness of the spoiled milk in the fridge was a clear sign it was time to clean it out.
meanings.sent4: The repulsiveness of the crime scene left a lasting impression on the detective.
meanings.sent5: The repulsiveness of the slimy texture made me shudder in disgust.

meanings.definition: The state of causing strong dislike or aversion.
meanings.sent1: The repulsiveness of the movie's plot made me leave the theater early.
meanings.sent2: His repulsiveness towards broccoli was evident when he refused to even try a bite.
meanings.sent3: The repulsiveness of the traffic jam was alleviated by listening to music in the car.
meanings.sent4: The repulsiveness of the situation made it hard for her to stay calm.
meanings.sent5: The repulsiveness of the smell coming from the dumpster was unbearable.
